recipe_name: Apple rings with ginger, lemon and black pepper tahini spread
author: Hemsley + Hemsley
method: Mix all of the ingredients except the apple slices together in a small bowl until well combined. Spread the mixture over the apple slices and serve.
ingredients: 5 tbsp tahini,  2 tsp finely grated ginger,  2 tsp honey,  Â½ tsp freshly ground black pepper,  pinch salt,  2 apples, peeled, cored, sliced into rounds
